about_the_game:
Coloring Book for Kids - Full Version offers an extended pleasure of coloring for you and your little ones. Choose from 14 categories and over 200 images to color. No watermark added.

AVAILABLE CATEGORIES:

🎨 Horse Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Dog Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Easter Coloring Pages - 26 sheets
🎨 Coloring Pages for Girls - 26 sheets
🎨 Princess Coloring Pages - 22 sheets
🎨 Fish Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Dinosaurs Coloring Pages - 22 sheets
🎨 Fairy Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Spring Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Coloring Pages For Boys - 20 sheets
🎨 Christmas Coloring Pages - 18 sheets
🎨 Flower Coloring Pages - 33 sheets
🎨 Dragon Coloring Pages - 20 sheets
🎨 Halloween Coloring Pages - 32 sheets

Give your kids the ultimate coloring time they deserve. Enjoy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Already in love with the Coloring Book for Kids? Take your creative habit even further and give your little ones an even bigger choice of coloring sheets. More coloring only means more fun!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
